text.__SUMMARY__: Dendrobium unicum is a species of orchid, commonly known as the unique dendrobium endemic to Southeast Asia, in Thailand, Laos, and Vietnam.  It was first described by Seidenfadden in 1970.
text.Cultivation:
Dendrobium unicum requires a cool climate with a temperature of 40 °F min. to 95 °F max.
